node.title: From bowsers to batteries: When demand for petrol dries up, what will happen to servos?
node.alt: A roadhouse with large forecourt against a big blue sky
node.description: ElectricÂ vehicles are coming, and they don't need liquid fuel. That spells trouble for service stations.
node.content:
["Every day, on average, Australia's 7,000 or so\u00a0service stations sell about 90 million litres of petrol and diesel \u2014\u00a0a river of fuel\u00a0that has been flowing for more than a century and keeps\u00a0over 55,000 people in work.", "But over the coming decades, the\u00a0flow of what the industry collectively calls \"motor spirit\"\u00a0is going to slow to a trickle, and may even dry up entirely.", "Electric\u00a0vehicles (EVs) are coming, and they don't need liquid fuel.", "", "
Most EV charging will probably be done at home, with public charging\u00a0for top-ups.(ABC News: Amy Bainbridge)
", "\"There's a lot of panic going on,\" says Stavros Yallouridis, chief executive officer of the Motor Traders' Association of NSW (MTANSW).", "Others are more bullish.", "Service stations will adapt, says\u00a0Mark\u00a0McKenzie,\u00a0chief executive officer of the peak body for fuel wholesalers and retailers, the\u00a0Australasian Convenience and Petroleum Marketers Association\u00a0(ACAPMA).", "So what's the future of your local\u00a0servo?", "
Up to 80 per cent unprofitable by 2035
", "To survive, the service station will have to change.", "In 2019, market research company Boston Consulting Group (BCG) studied\u00a0the global fuel retail industry and published a report that sent shockwaves through the industry: when most cars\u00a0were EVs, it said, most service stations would be unable to turn a profit.", "Under the most extreme\u00a0scenario, 60 to 80 per cent of service stations could\u00a0be unprofitable by 2035, unless they change their business models.", "\"It is a big change and I think it's something all of the petrol stations will need to think about carefully and prepare for,\" says Anita Oh, BCG's managing director.", "\"But it's also a big opportunity.\"", "", "
A concept design for a service station with EV charging stations, solar PV and wind turbines.(Supplied: ENOC Group)
", "The industry will have to radically\u00a0reimagine\u00a0the purpose of its\u00a0strategically located roadside real estate.", "The big question is this: Without fuel, why would anyone go to a servo?", "Australian trials show about 80 per cent of EV\u00a0charging occurs at home.", "Service stations will no longer have a monopoly on energy transport; even\u00a0the charging done outside of the home can take place\u00a0in a supermarket carpark while you're buying groceries.", "", "
Public EV chargers can be anywhere, not just in servos.(ABC Radio Adelaide: Malcolm Sutton)
", "Hungry Jack's has already installed its first\u00a0EV charger.", "This month, the chief executive officer of the global EV charging station company Tritium told an Australian infrastructure summit that petrol stations are facing their own\u00a0\"Kodak moment\" \u2014\u00a0a reference to the\u00a0camera-film giant that went bankrupt with the switch to digital cameras.", "BCG's Ms\u00a0Oh says service stations are taking notice.", "\"In the last year or so these conversations have started to accelerate.\"", "
'We've got some who say it'll never happen'
", "Although the conversations about the threat of EVs to the fuel retail business model have become more urgent, they're not new.", "The fuel industry was contemplating this back in 2015.", "That year, fuel wholesalers and retailers gathered at a Sunshine Coast conference centre for their annual get-together, including a chat about EVs.", "Only a few thousand had been sold in Australia so far, but a presentation led by a futurist and an architect specialising in service stations asked the assembled executives to open their minds and\u00a0consider the possibility of a \"post-normal\" world in which EVs were commonplace.", "The presenters\u00a0asked: \"In 20 years, people living in this future world \u2014\u00a0why are they going to stop at a service station?\"", "They wouldn't, they said. But they might stop at a \"community hub\".\u00a0", "Service stations would become co-working spaces and meeting rooms,\u00a0warehouses for online order deliveries, dispatch centres for driverless cars, and one-stop shops for household needs.", "", "
The concept design of a \"community hub\" service station presented at the 2015 conference.(Supplied:ACAPMA/Cadway Projects)
", "", "
An on-site car-stacker automatically retrieves and dispatches driverless vehicles.(Supplied: ACAPMA/Cadway Projects)
", "Six years later, this post-normal world is taking shape.\u00a0", "Under current policy settings, government modelling forecasts EVs will make up 30 per cent of new car sales by 2030, with uptake accelerating\u00a0as EVs fall in price and public charging infrastructure is rolled out.", "For Australia to meet its commitment of net-zero domestic emissions by 2050, almost all\u00a0transport\u00a0will have to be electric.", "Mark McKenzie, the ACAPMA chief who organised that 2015 conference, says the industry is split on what to do about the change.", "\"We've\u00a0got some people who say it'll never happen \u2014\u00a0not in our lifetime,\" he says.", "\"There are other\u00a0groups who say we have to get on to this, we don't want to be left at the starting blocks.\"", "
Fuel is going to decline: Ampol
", "One fuel retailer\u00a0preparing for change is Ampol,\u00a0which operates just under 2,000 branded service stations in Australia.", "The fuel giant\u00a0has recently\u00a0performed a \"strategic reset\" around EVs,\u00a0says Matthew Halliday, the company's chief executive officer.", "\"It certainly has\u00a0received very significant focus from the middle part of last year,\" he says.", "So, what's the solution?", "Ampol plans for its nationwide network of service stations to\u00a0become\u00a0EV fast-charging locations, hydrogen fuel retailers, neighbourhood stores, cafes and restaurants, online delivery centres, and even small-scale utilities, with solar generation and battery storage.", "", "
A\u00a0350kW ultra-fast EV charger at an Ampol service station forecourt in Seven Hills, Sydney.(Supplied: Ampol)
", "In July, it announced it was installing over 400\u00a0EV fast chargers at 121 service stations around Australia, as part of a $7 million funding agreement with the Australian Renewable Energy Agency.", "\"We're also exploring batteries and having the ability to use the power on site through charging ... and\u00a0dispatching back into the grid,\" Mr Halliday says.", "Stations in dense inner-city areas or situated\u00a0on busy country highways are likely to be the most viable: each will have\u00a0a large captive market for\u00a0public charging facilities.\u00a0Suburban service stations, meanwhile, will find it hardest to compete with home charging.", "About 20-30 per cent of service stations' industry-wide revenue is convenience and grocery sales like chips and drinks.", "This \"convenience offer\" will grow, Mr Halliday says.", "Servos will become more like neighbourhood stores, cafes and restaurants, which has been a trend\u00a0since the 1990s.", "So how many servos are\u00a0likely to be around in 20 years' time?", "\"There's still too much uncertainty to have real clarity,\" Mr Halliday says.", "
'I don't think EVs are going to take over fuel'
", "Many service stations are independently owned, and they don't necessarily have the money to \"pivot\" their business.", "These owners and operators now find themselves in a tricky situation; they're being told their world is about to change and they have to prepare, but can see\u00a0little evidence of disruption, or reason to act.", "Some are just\u00a0ignoring the threat, says MTANSW's\u00a0Mr Yallouridis.", "\"They've been accustomed to just providing fuel and small groceries,\" he says.", "At the same time, they're worried.", "\"Some of these are\u00a0family businesses and they've got the younger generation growing up thinking about succession planning and the future.\"", "", "
A US service station in 1974. Few could have imagined these basic facilities would morph into grocery shops\u00a0and franchised restaurants.(Getty: Pictorial Parade)
", "", "
A concept design for a service station co-working space and \"community hub\".(Supplied: ACAPMA/Cadway Projects)
", "Diann Melas is the operations manager with Budget Petrol, which supplies 60 independent service stations around NSW.", "Of these, only one station in\u00a0Goulburn\u00a0has an EV charger.", "\"It's not something people are coming in and asking for,\" Ms Melas says.", "She's aware of the talk around a long-term decline in fuel sales, but thinks\u00a0that's still many years away, and may never arrive.", "\"I don't think EVs are going to take over fuel. Not in my lifetime,\" she says.", "\"You sign a service station lease today for 20 years and you say in 20 years' time are we going to be selling fuel?", "Under current policy settings,\u00a0petrol sales aren't plummeting\u00a0anytime soon.", "If EVs make up 30 per cent of new car sales by 2030, more than 90 per cent of vehicles on the road will still be needing \"motor spirit\".", "\"Thirty per cent of sales as EVs by 2030 means 70 per cent won't be EVs,\" the ACAPMA's Mr McKenzie says.", "
Norwegian servos are installing 'lounges'
", "Whatever happens in Australia, it'll have happened overseas first.", "Countries like Norway are at least 10 years ahead in EV uptake and already seeing an impact\u00a0on service stations.", "Speaking from Oslo, the Norwegian EV Association's Snorre Sleetvold says service stations aren't closing down \u2014 at least not yet.", "\"They have a high focus on building the\u00a0next energy station \u2014\u00a0they're shifting from being petrol stations to being energy stations.", "", "
A service station outside Kongsberg in Norway with lounge and 300kW ulra-fast EV chargers.(Supplied: Elbil)
", "This sounds a lot like the design concepts for the \"post-normal\" future pitched at that\u00a0Sunshine Coast conference back in 2015.", "Whether or not any of it will work remains to be seen.", "Most cars in Norway are still petrol or diesel, which means the impact of the switch to EVs hasn't yet been properly felt.", "\"The number of pure gasoline stations will fall dramatically in the next 10 years,\" Mr\u00a0Sleetvold says.", "MTANSW's Mr Yallouridis plans to travel to Norway next year for research.", "\"There's a cultural shift that needs to be done by\u00a0the entrepreneur, the business owner,\" he says.", "", "
The Daly Waters Pub \"outback servo\" may have to swap the bowsers for EV chargers.(Getty: Raimund Franken)
"]
